short_summary: Advanced Contract Award Notice: Elder Helper Services (2), 1 year contract, $63,999.88 (including GST/HST), service provided by Indigenous worker.
description: This contract is for Elder Helper services for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at Saskatchewan Penitentiary, Prince Albert, SK. The contracted service is to provide assistance and support to Indigenous offenders in their traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions.  The scope of work includes assisting Indigenous offenders, providing spiritual ceremonies, counselling services, reporting, and day-to-day activities as directed by the Project Authority. The contractor must perform the work in English, and must not remove any protected information or assets from the work site.  The contractor must have a valid Reliability Status, granted or approved by CSC, and must ensure that their personnel are made aware of and comply with this restriction. The contractor must also comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Check List, as described in Annex C.  Only suppliers who meet the definition of an Indigenous Business, as defined in the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), may submit a statement of capabilities.
